fields.description: Unique identifier for the bot user
fields.label: Bot Name
Bot Type
fields.options:
Data Collection Bot
Monitoring Bot
Analysis Bot
Alert Bot
Maintenance Bot
Quality Control Bot
Reporting Bot
Integration Bot

fields.description: Specific workstation for focused data collection
fields.label: Workstation

fields.description: Associated user account for the bot
fields.label: User Account

fields.description: Description of bot's purpose and functionality
fields.label: Purpose
Collection Frequency
fields.options:
Real-time
Every 5 Seconds
Every 10 Seconds
Every 30 Seconds
Every Minute
Every 5 Minutes
Every 15 Minutes
Every 30 Minutes
Hourly
Daily

fields.description: JSON list of parameters and measurements collected by the bot
fields.label: Parameters Collected
Data Source
fields.options:
PLC
SCADA
API
Database
File System
Sensor Network
Web Service
Manual Entry

fields.description: Number of records to process in each batch
fields.label: Batch Size

fields.description: Maximum number of records to buffer
fields.label: Buffer Size

fields.description: API key for authentication
fields.label: API Key

fields.description: JSON list of permissions granted to the bot
fields.label: Permissions
Access Level
fields.options:
Read Only
Read/Write
Admin
Restricted
Full Access

fields.description: Expiry date/time for authentication token
fields.label: Token Expiry

fields.description: Token for refreshing authentication
fields.label: Refresh Token

fields.description: Security group assignment for access control
fields.label: Security Group

fields.description: Timestamp of last successful data collection
fields.label: Last Collection Time

fields.description: Scheduled time for next data collection
fields.label: Next Collection Time

fields.description: Total number of successful collections
fields.label: Collection Count

fields.description: Total number of collection errors
fields.label: Error Count

fields.description: Percentage of successful collections
fields.label: Success Rate

fields.description: Average response time for data collection
fields.label: Average Response Time (ms)

fields.description: Log of recent errors and issues
fields.label: Error Log

fields.description: JSON configuration for data collection rules and filters
fields.label: Collection Rules

fields.description: JSON configuration for notifications and alerts
fields.label: Notification Settings

fields.description: JSON configuration for retry logic and error handling
fields.label: Retry Configuration
